title: City of Red Midnight: A Hikayat
description: In this spell-binding tale, a Pakistani storyteller captivates a group of wide-eyed tourists with a nesting doll of interlocked stories about a trickster and a hidden city ruled by the Queen of Red Midnight.At the Publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management Software (DRM) applied.
author: Usman T. Malik
